import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; function Register() { const [formdata, changeform] = useState({ name:'', email:'', password:'', password2: '' }); const {name, email, password , password2} = formdata; const onChange = e => changeform({...formdata, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}); return (

)} export default Register;
